name: The Gatherer
credits:
Rita-Bernstein - Character art, ZHS translation
Jedi - RUS translation
MappyTheKat - Old character splash art
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 7 relics.

v1.0.0 - v1.0.2 (2020-01-15 - 2020-02-20)
- Art update: Removed all BETA watermarks and unmodified base game art.
- Updated for 2.0 release (Watcher release).
- Balance changes and reworks

v1.0.3 (2020-05-16)
- RUS localization update (thanks to Jedi)
- Frenzy now adds 1 Dazed into your discard pile. (was 2)
- Frenzy damage: 10(13) -> 9(12)
- Now you can increase the number of hits of Finishing Strike using Enchant.

v1.0.4 (2020-05-18)
- Fix Poison patch incompatibility

Visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1611788501 for full change notes.
